DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the effectiveness of low molecular weight hyaluronic acid oral tablets for the treatment of atrophic vaginitis.
DOC.brief_title: Oral Low-molecular Weight Hyaluronic Acid in the Treatment of Atrophic Vaginitis
DOC.criteria: at least 12 months postmenopausal mucosal atrophy and the main bothersome related symptoms, such as itching, burning, and dyspareunia.
